home.title: Vivelog - kyauta akan layi yana koyo | Darussan, albarkatu & takardar shaida
home.startLearningNow: Fara koyo shi kuma shirya don jarrabawa a yau
home.whyChooseVieVlog: Me yasa kuma koya shi da vivelog?
home.learnIT: Yi farin ciki da karfi shi ne koyawa, darussan, da albarkatu daga masu koyar da malamai - gaba daya kyauta.
home.learnFromExperts: Tafiya ta da katun da kwararru da masu ilimi.
home.learnAtYourOwnPace: Koya a cikin hanzari tare da samun cikakkiyar darasi mara iyaka.
home.coverAllAspects: Ya ƙunshi masu ganowa don ci gaba da manufarsa ciki har da lambar sadarwa, tsarin, da ƙari.
home.viewAllIT: Bincika duk ka'idodin vivelog da gwajin gwaji
home.whatOurLearnersSay: Abin da xaliban ke faɗi game da vivelog

testimonial1.quote: Vivelo ya taimaka min da karfin gwiwa ta amince da jarrabawar takardar shaida.
testimonial1.name: Nguyen Minh Anh Anh Anh Anh

testimonial2.quote: Koyo shi ta hanyar vivelog yana da inganci da jin daɗi!
testimonial2.name: Tran Hai Nam

testimonial3.quote: Godiya ga Vivelog, Na inganta mahimmancin dabarun shirye-shiryena.
testimonial3.name: Le Thaid

home.yourOneStopShop: Platportayaƙwalwar da ke tsaye ta dayawa don kwarewar fasaha da kuma shirya wa jarrabawar takardar shaida. Samu damar zuwa mafi yawan abun ciki ba tare da tsada ba!
home.connectWithUs: Bi vivelog a kan kafofin watsa labarun

socialMedia.linkedin: Haɗa tare da mu akan LinkedIn

metadata.lesson: Binciko darussan mu kuma zaɓi cikakkiyar hanya don dacewa da matakin ƙwarewar ku.

footer.followUs: Biyo mu akan kafofin watsa labarun
